name: Dark Woods (Shadow)
description:
Introduction

Welcome to the game called Dark Woods. In this game, we are going to put your mind and skill through its limit. Use your power and environment to get to the end. Are you up to take the challenge? Will you make it? Find out by playing Dark Woods.

Game

This is a game where a person mysteriously wakes up in the dark woods. He slowly finds out that he isn't a human anymore. He starts to navigate around the forest by solving puzzles and using the environment. Will he make it?

How to play Task

You have to use the environment to journey forward.

Controls

The game has few simple controls. They are listed below.

  • A and D to move left and right;
  • Shift to sprint;
  • Space to jump;
  • R to rewind;
  • F to interact with lever.
Levels

There are currently 7 playable levels in the game. They are written below.

  • Level 1 - Introduction;
  • Level 2 - Forest 1;
  • Level 3 - Forest 2;
  • Level 4 - Forest 3;
  • Level 5 - Forest 4;
  • Level 6 - Forest 5;
  • Level 7 - Forest 6.
Playable Device

The game currently only supports Windows.
